data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Yuxia, Li, Limei, Yang, Xingke (2015): Description of four new species related to Fissocantharis novemexcavatus (Wittmer, 1951) (Coleoptera, Cantharidae) from China. Zootaxa 4058 (3): 362-372, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.3.4
